name: Cold Vos! + Kaon! Light up my world
name_original: Cold Vos! + Kaon! Light up my world
description:
Cold Vos!

It is cold on Messatine. Too cold. Especially too cold for  certain gunformer! Find clothes to keep him warm. 

Kaon! Light up my world. 

Winter decorations are a serious business on the Peaceful Tyranny. Unfortunately, the ship's battery power is too weak to light up the tree. Good thing Kaon is there to help!

Made for DresdenComplex for the Transformers Secret Solenoid Exchange
